posts.content:
I've been trying to get an ad on the Buses for sale forum for 2 weeks now without any success or any help. I want to sell my Campervan using the draft Ad document that I created and comes in 3 formats, Word / PDF / jpg all with pictures and 9 pages long.
As I have been unable to upload these files to the forum above, is there anyone out there that can help me get this sale moving.
I am a absolute beginner on this site and have never use these forums before now.
I can be contacted by email: rgbargee@btinternet.com
The following is the text from the 1st page of the ad document:

A 1967 VW RHD Walkthrough Devon/Dormobile Campervan for sale
I bought this Bus 23 years ago with the Paintwork as seen (except for the Grey and rusty primer bits), and it has been a labour of Luv ever since.
I had a 1964 and a 1966 Beetle which I sold on.
I’ve now decided the time has
come for me to give up on this restoration project as I’m not getting any younger.
So up for grabs is my 2nd Luv; for those who want a 100% original Bus that is now a 48yr old classic that still needs a little more TLC for it to survive for another 23 years.

I've tried to upload the ads 1st page as an attachment but the file is to large; Help.

I can help you with your for sale advert. I will drop you an email.

Cheers Miles.
Yes Please, I'll reply to your email and Thanks.
